forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
